parameters.name: Index
parameters.description: Index number of the criteria to delete

title: IAdvancedSelectionCriteria.DeleteItem
description: Deletes a criteria from the advanced component selection list.

parameters.name: Index
parameters.description: Index number of the criteria to delete

returns: True if criteria is deleted, false if not
remarks:
Call
IAdvancedSelectionCriteria::GetItemCount
to get a valid value for Index before calling this method.
